6 6 60 9   Exclude diagrams 
 This option can be used to exclude diagrams with virtual
particles named by the user. For example:
               W+>1,Z
excludes diagrams with more than 1 virtual W+ and diagrams
containing virtual Z bosons.
 Input         Z<1 
excludes diagrams which contains less than one Z particle.

  Use empty input to get the full set of diagrams.
